### Description

it happens that DynamicPivotBlockManager is selecting many times in a second, and the log if full of these line


`"thread":"EthScheduler-Services-1 (checkNewPivotBlock)","class":"DynamicPivotBlockManager","message":"Select new pivot block 12676530 0x036190332f8ac61e7ab8209e1fb611571948c7cff6d19f5fd1ee4fc48026d9e4","throwable":""}`

see the full log attached [DynamicPivotBlockManager-spam.log](https://github.com/hyperledger/besu/files/9251268/DynamicPivotBlockManager-spam.log)


**Frequency:** [What percentage of the time does it occur?]

1. it happened today on a node, and a restart did not help
